Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

i have a problem. While i try to fly a Space Station into the Space, all of my Kerbals disapear on the way.

I dont know why this is happening. There is no message "killed in action" or something else. They just disapear and the rocket is freaking out ! Yeah

Can someone help me?

I am not sure wich informations do you need to help me so just ask.
